name: GHA Composite: Lint + Typecheck + Build
description: Reusable composite action to lint, typecheck and build.

files.template:
name: Lint Typecheck Build
description: Run lint, typecheck and build
runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - run: npm run -s lint || echo 'no lint'
      shell: bash
    - run: npm run -s typecheck || npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'no typecheck'
      shell: bash
    - run: npm run -s build || echo 'no build'
      shell: bash
